document.heading: Water and Sewer Repair and Compensation Act of 1976

history.narrative: Law 1-98, the “Water and Sewer Repair and Compensation Act of 1976,” was introduced in Council and assigned Bill No. 1-319, which was referred to the Committee on Transportation and Environmental Affairs. The Bill was adopted on first and second readings on October 12, 1976 and November 22, 1976, respectively. Signed by the Mayor on December 30, 1976, it was assigned Act No. 1-187 and transmitted to both Houses of Congress for its review.
